DataElement.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Diagnosis Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of the onset of a syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant usually affecting the skin, liver, and gi tract.  Onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant usually affecting the skin, liver, and gi tract.  Onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A graft versus host disease with symptoms appearing within the first 100 days post-transplant, but with short duration.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of Onset of Acute GVHD

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support CCR Acute GVHD trial
